# coder users create

## Usage

```console
coder users create [flags]
```

## Flags

### --email, -e

Specifies an email address for the new user.
<br/>
| | |
| --- | --- |

### --password, -p

Specifies a password for the new user.
<br/>
| | |
| --- | --- |

### --username, -u

Specifies a username for the new user.
<br/>
| | |
| --- | --- |
